title: Sweet potato and spinach risotto with chicken
ingredients: ['750ml chicken stock', '600ml water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '20g butter', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '350g Arborio rice', '500g sweet potato, cut into 1cm pieces', '500g boneless chicken breasts', '125g baby spinach leaves', '40g finely grated Parmesan cheese']
